text: Eghtɨ amizir pumuning uaning inigh maziaba rɨghrɨghtɨma, God tav inighɨva tav ategham.”(17:35-36) Baibelɨn fofozir gumazir maba ghaze akar otevir mam uaghan kagh iti. Akar otevir kam kamakɨn, “Gumazir pumuning azenimɨn ikɨtɨ, God aningɨn tav inigh egha tav ategham.” Nɨ deragh foghsɨ, Mt 24:40ɨn gan.
